title: Parameters in dict not registered
body_html:
class model(nn.Module):
    def __init__(self):
        super().__init__()
        self.d = dict()
        self.d['d'] = nn.Parameter(torch.Tensor(3,3))
        self.p = nn.Parameter(torch.Tensor(3,3))

m = model()
for n,p in m.named_parameters():
    print(n,p.size())
>> p torch.Size([3, 3])

python 3.6.5
PyTorch '0.4.0'

body:
```
class model(nn.Module):
    def __init__(self):
        super().__init__()
        self.d = dict()
        self.d['d'] = nn.Parameter(torch.Tensor(3,3))
        self.p = nn.Parameter(torch.Tensor(3,3))

m = model()
for n,p in m.named_parameters():
    print(n,p.size())
>> p torch.Size([3, 3])
```

python 3.6.5
PyTorch '0.4.0'
